name: js-benchmarks
description: Cross-benchmark suite for old @lix-js/sdk vs new js-sdk

scripts.bench:state: pnpm --filter js-sdk run build && pnpm --filter js-sdk run build:dist && pnpm --filter @lix-js/sdk run build && pnpm run bench:state:run
scripts.bench:state:quick: BENCH_ITER_SINGLE=40 BENCH_ITER_CHUNK_10=20 BENCH_ITER_CHUNK_100=8 BENCH_WARMUP=1 pnpm run bench:state
scripts.bench:json: pnpm --filter js-sdk run build && pnpm --filter js-sdk run build:dist && pnpm --filter @lix-js/sdk run build && pnpm --filter @lix-js/plugin-json run build && pnpm run bench:json:run
scripts.bench:json:quick: BENCH_JSON_ITER=24 BENCH_JSON_LEAF_COUNT=120 BENCH_WARMUP=1 pnpm run bench:json
scripts.bench:json:breakdown: pnpm --filter js-sdk run build && pnpm --filter js-sdk run build:dist && pnpm run bench:json:breakdown:run
scripts.bench:json:breakdown:quick: BENCH_JSON_ITER=18 BENCH_JSON_LEAF_COUNT=120 BENCH_WARMUP=1 pnpm run bench:json:breakdown
